project_plan.name: Python-Based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Design a Python-based quiz game that asks the user multiple-choice questions, keeps track of the user's score, and displays it at the end of the game.

task.name: Implement the class structure for the quiz game
Define multiple-choice questions and answers in a variable
Create a function to display questions and capture user input
Implement score tracking based on user responses
Create a function to display the final score at the end of the game
Write tests for each of the above features to ensure functionality
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure they function correctly
